author: Yessi Bello Perez
title: 9 tips to perfect your ‘working from home’ morning routine
description: If you work from home, getting your morning routine down to a tee will have a huge impact on how you work — and feel — for the rest of the day. Ultimately, it’s about doing what works for you, but here are a few pointers that will hopefully help you start you…
content:
Its tempting to roll out of bed and sit at your desk, but before you know it, itll be 2pm and youll have to dash off to get ready for your video call. Dont do this, save yourself the stress!
Have breakfast
